-- | Authentication plugin for Yesod using smbclient
--   
--   Provides smbclient authentication module that simply lets a user
--   specify his/her identifier.
@package yesod-auth-smbclient
@version 2.0.0.0

module Yesod.Auth.SmbClient

-- | The smbclient authentication plugin.
authSmbClient :: YesodAuth m => Text -> Text -> AuthPlugin m
